nodes.goal: Isolate variable x on left side of the equation
nodes.plan: Subtract 2*x from both sides to get 2*x on one side

nodes.goal: Get all constant terms on the right side of the equation
nodes.plan: Subtract 6 from both sides to get 4*x = 8

nodes.goal: Get x on its own by dividing both sides by the coefficient of x
nodes.plan: Divide both sides by 4 to get x = 2
